metadata.dc:author: de Medina, S
Ginés, F
Tenorio, R
Chaparro, O
Cózar, L
Pérez, H
metadata.dc:description: We present a case of reno-entero-colic fistula which is extremely rare and which, in the face of unspecific clinical pictures requires a detailed examination. Its physiopathology, the surgical problems which it poses and the means of solving these, are explained.
metadata.dc:title: Fistula renoenterocólica.
[Renoenterocolic fistula].
